title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When switching from SWT.SINGLE to SWT.MULTI in the SWT example ControlExample under the Text tab, a Windows 'ding' sound is heard.
EB: I expect that no sound should be heard when switching between SWT.SINGLE and SWT.MULTI in the ControlExample of SWT.
SR:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Click on the Styles SWT.SINGLE.
4. Click on the Styles SWT.MULTI.
5. Observe the Windows 'ding' sound being heard.
